name: OverflowArena
description:
Just a simple top-down shooter for the Juice Jam II.

The controls are in the menu
The game has no music

Every 10 seconds the player has two choices, both with a good change and a bad change ( negative changes have preference over positive ones )


There are a few enemies that spawn by rounds, there are three types: the fast enemy, the one that shoots and the tank. The game health system is based on hits, not damage, and everything except the tank enemy dies from 1 hit including the player.
